name: Reptile
title: The Toxic Assassin
subtitle: A deadly warrior who uses poison and stealth to eliminate his prey
lore: The last known survivor of his reptilian race, Reptile is a deadly warrior who combines his natural abilities with lethal toxins. His mastery of poison and stealth makes him a feared assassin, while his ability to shed his skin and become invisible allows him to strike from unexpected angles. Despite his fearsome appearance, he seeks to restore his extinct race.

passive.name: Poisoned Casting
passive.description: Reptile's every hit ability or basic attack deals additional [80-555] damage over 5 seconds (max 3 stacks).

Q.name: Acid Spit
Q.description: Reptile spews a large amount of acid in the targeted direction, dealing [125/230/440/780/930/1225] damage. It creates a pool of acid at the end of the ability's range or behind hit enemies, which slows enemies by [55%] and triggers the passive. The poison spreads among enemies nearby the hit target, resetting the duration of the poison.

W.name: Exuviation
W.description: Reptile sheds its slimy skin, removing all crowd control effects.

E.name: Fadeaway
E.description: Reptile becomes invisible to enemies for [5/7/8/9/10] seconds. Instead of bonus damage, it increases Reptile's overall damage by [20%] for [3s] after breaking invisibility.

R.name: The Mark of The Lizard
R.description: Targets an enemy, placing a mark on them for [15s]. While the mark is active, Reptile runs towards them at double speed and deals [130%/175%/200%] bonus damage. The mark ignores enemy shields for its duration.

1.name: Early Hunter
1.description: Reptile's R ability unlocks at level 1.

1.name: Toxic Shield
1.description: Reptile gains [20%] Magic shield while at least two targets are poisoned.

5.name: Spreading Toxin
5.description: Your passive spreads in a wider range, and it now blows up when it expires, spreading again.

10.name: Swift Hunter
10.description: The R ability cooldown is reduced by 20s.

10.name: Natural Instinct
10.description: The R ability no longer consumes mana.

15.name: Protective Skin
15.description: Using W, Reptile gains 1 autoattack shield.

15.name: Rapid Recovery
15.description: The cooldown of the W ability is reduced from 15s to [8s].

15.name: Toxic Amplification
15.description: Enemies poisoned by Reptile take [15%] more damage from Reptile.

20.name: Relentless Hunter
20.description: The cooldown of The Mark of The Lizard is reduced to [5s].

20.name: Potent Acid
20.description: The Q ability damage is increased by [15%].
